actions.expectedResult: The "Attributes & Features" page is displayed correctly.

actions.action: Click the "Features" tab at the top of the page.
actions.expectedResult: The page switches to the features list.

actions.action: Click "Add new feature" in the top-right corner.
actions.expectedResult: A new page appears containing a form to create a new feature.

actions.action: Enter the feature name e.g. "Season" in the "Name" field.
actions.expectedResult: "Season" is successfully entered in the "Name" field.
A "Successful creation" message is displayed and the user is returned to the features list page.
